FuncDef: The reset mpls rsvp-te statistics command deletes operational statistics about RSVP-TE.
CLIs: reset mpls rsvp-te statistics { global | interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } }

ParaDef.Info:
Deletes global operational statistics about RSVP-TE.
-

Deletes operational statistics about RSVP-TE on a specified interface.
-

Specifies the type and number of an RSVP-TE interface. If no type or number of an interface is specified, statistics about all RSVP-TE interfaces are cleared.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the reset mpls rsvp-te statistics command is run to clear statistics about RSVP-TE, the statistics are then recollected and displayed.
